questions.q1: How does BonjourImmo ensure my property gets seen?
questions.q3: Can I modify my listing after posting?
questions.q4: What happens if I exceed my monthly listing limit?
questions.q5: Is my data secure on BonjourImmo?
questions.q6: What types of properties can I list?
questions.q7: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.q8: How do I communicate with potential buyers or renters?
questions.q9: What’s the difference between the Plus and Premium plans?
questions.q10: Can agencies list properties on BonjourImmo?

answers.a1: We use a priority-based search algorithm to rank listings based on their relevance and visibility settings. Listings in the Plus or Premium plans enjoy higher placement in search results.
answers.a2: No hidden fees—our pricing is fully transparent. Unlike agencies, we do not take a percentage of your sale or rent.
answers.a3:
Yes, you can modify your listing's status anytime based on its type. If you want to make additional changes to your listing (e.g., description, images, or price), you can: 

1. Change the status to 'Inactive' and create a new listing under your Plus or Premium plan.
2. Contact our support team, and we will handle the changes for you free of charge.
answers.a4: You can upgrade your plan to increase your limit or wait until the next billing cycle when your limit resets.
answers.a5: Yes, we prioritize your data security with industry-standard encryption and verified user accounts.
answers.a6: You can list any property type, including apartments, houses, land, and vacation rentals, for sale, rent, or short-term stays.
answers.a7: Absolutely! Our plans are flexible with no long-term commitments. You can cancel or change your plan anytime.
answers.a8: We do not provide an in-app messaging system. To ensure interested buyers or renters can contact you, we recommend providing your best contact information (e.g., phone number or email) when creating your listing.
answers.a9: The Plus plan offers 10 listings/month and priority search visibility, while Premium provides 25 listings/month, top placement, and unlimited modifications.
answers.a10: BonjourImmo is dedicated exclusively to private landlords, providing a commission-free platform for direct transactions.
